column1: '''''Firestorm Apocalypse - Tomorrow Shall Know the Blackest Dawn''''' is  [[Cirith Gorgor (band)
column2: Cirith Gorgor]]'s third full length album, released in [[2005]]. It was produced by Cirith Gorgor and recorded at Q-Sonic Production Studio.

column1: # "Firestorm Apocalypse - The Coming of a Greater Era"
